definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: Mark couldn't pay his bill, so he asked the owner to put it on the cuff.
sentences.chinese: 馬克付不起帳了，就向店主賒賬。

sentences.english: The tradesman was vigorously soliciting for my custom.
sentences.chinese: 那個店主極力向我拉生意。

sentences.english: The owner showed no compromise in her face.
sentences.chinese: 女店主的臉上還是沒有任何表情。

sentences.english: Manage " flagman sports " the merchant of net inn also by punishment arrest.
sentences.chinese: 經營“旗手體育”網店的店主也被刑拘。

sentences.english: He's been charged with extorting money from several shopkeepers.
sentences.chinese: 他受到指控，罪名是向幾個店主勒索錢財。

sentences.english: The baker, who was the proprietor in person, took up a loaf and a knife.
sentences.chinese: 那賣麪包的便是店主人，他拿起了一個麪包和一把刀。

sentences.english: The owner of the shop asked mum where she came from.
sentences.chinese: 店主人問老媽從哪裏裏來。

sentences.english: Out of curiosity, I asked the owner of the four-leaf clover is how so many come.
sentences.chinese: 出於好奇，我問店主這麼多的四葉草是如何得來的。

sentences.english: If your employer isn't already aware of your plans, ask for a meeting to explain.
sentences.chinese: 假如店主還不知道你的謀劃，請求劈面解釋。

sentences.english: On board were an aviator, a jeweler, a storekeeper, to name a few.
sentences.chinese: 在甲板上有飛行員，珠寶商，店主等。

sentences.english: The shop-owner asks all the shop-assistants to attend to customers patiently.
sentences.chinese: 這位店主要求所有店員耐心地接待顧客。

sentences.english: But one of them, a shopkeeper was sad.
sentences.chinese: 但他們其中的一個，一位店主有點沮喪。

sentences.english: The shopkeeper was deeply moved. He cooked the dish elaborately for him and specially made it into the shape of horse bell.
sentences.chinese: 店主深爲感動，爲他精心烹製，並特意做成馬鈴形狀。

sentences.english: Shopkeepers boarded up their stores for fear of looters.
sentences.chinese: 店主因爲害怕被搶劫而封住他們的商店。

sentences.english: She owed money to every tradesman in the town.
Please inform Stephy to arrange posting after payment is made.
sentences.chinese: 所以付款後請及時告訴店主安排發貨。

definition: proprietor of a shop or restaurant/landlord/shop
